original_text: And I will cast abominable filth upon thee, and make thee vile, and will set thee as a gazingstock.
korean_text: 내가 또 가증하고 더러운 것들을 네 위에 던져 능욕하여 너를 구경 거리가 되게 하리니

sentences.original_text: And I will cast abominable filth upon thee
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너에게 혐오스러운 더러운 것을 던지겠으며

sentences.original_text: and will set thee as a gazingstock
